expo.name: Now UI React Native

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Enable Camera Acess so that you can record  Videos
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Enable Microphone Access so that you can start recording audio
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Enable Camera Roll Access so that you can select Other Videos from Camera Roll

expo.description: Now UI React Native, based on Now UI Design System. Coded by Creative Tim
